name: easyTennis
description:
Test your reflexes and your coordination with this simple tennis game: one single frantic match with a stronger opponent, in which you gain score resisting as long as possible, while, of course, you try to win.
Easy touch controls (simply slide your finger left-right to move the player), pixel art players, pure action and no fuzz.
Game Center leaderboard support to compare your results with your friends around the world.
